sen.j: 近衛通（このえどおり）は京都市左京区の東西の通りの一つ。
sen.e: Konoe-dori Steet is one of the streets that run from east to west in Sakyo Ward, Kyoto City.
Konoe-dori Steet is one of the streets that run from east to west in Sakyo Ward, Kyoto City.
Konoe-dori Steet is one of the streets that run from east to west in Sakyo Ward, Kyoto City.

sen.j: 延長の多くが学校敷地に面しており、一般建造物は少ない。
sen.e: The extensions of the street often face the school compounds, and as such, there are not many private buildings on the street.
The extensions of the street often face the school grounds, and as such, there are not many private buildings on the street.
The extensions of the street often face the school grounds, and as such, there are not many private buildings on the street.

sen.j: 西は鴨川 (淀川水系)に架かる荒神橋を介して荒神口通につながる。
sen.e: The western end is connected to Kojinguchi-dori Street via Kojin-bashi Bridge over Kamo-gawa River (part of the Yodo-gawa River system).
The western end is connected to Kojinguchi-dori Street via Kojin-bashi Bridge over Kamo-gawa River (part of the Yodo-gawa River system).
The western end is connected to Kojinguchi-dori Street via Kojin-bashi Bridge over Kamo-gawa River (part of the Yodo-gawa River system).

sen.j: 全区間歩道が整備されている。
sen.e: There are sidewalks through the length of the street.
There are sidewalks throughout the length of the street.
There are sidewalks throughout the length of the street.

tit.e: Main facilities along the Konoe-dori Street

sen.j: 京都市立近衛中学校 東大路東入
